text: Herbert Eugene Harris, II (April 14, 1926 â€“ December 24, 2014) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the United States House of Representatives from Virginia. His district included part of Fairfax County. He served as a representative from 1975 through 1981. Harris died on December 24, 2014 at his house on Fairfax County, Virginia, aged 88. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Kansas City, Missouri
title: Herbert Harris
